dataflow.temp_location: <Cloud Storage Location to store temporary files (eg: gs://<bucket_name>/<folder_name>>/)>

gcs.output_folder: <Cloud Storage Location to store generated embeddings (eg: gs://<bucket_name>/<folder_name>/)>

bigtable.id_column: <The fully qualified column name where the ID is stored. In the format cf:col or _key>
bigtable.embedding_column: <The fully qualified column name where the embeddings are stored. In the format cf:col or _key>
bigtable.crowding_tag_column: <The fully qualified column name where the crowding tag is stored. In the format cf:col or _key>
bigtable.allow_restricts_mappings: <Columns to Export from Bigtable Table to allow restricts>
bigtable.deny_restricts_mappings: <Columns to Export from Bigtable Table to deny restricts>
bigtable.int_numeric_restricts_mappings: <Columns to Export from Bigtable Table to int numeric restricts>
bigtable.float_numeric_restricts_mappings: <Columns to Export from Bigtable Table to float numeric restricts>
bigtable.double_numeric_restricts_mappings: <Columns to Export from Bigtable Table to double numeric restricts>
